full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KLU GTOR GDENGS CAN DGA' BSKYED BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(SPYIR KLU GTOR NI THEBS YOD MED LA BLTOS NA'ANG DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I PHYAG LEN GYI DKAR CHA BZHI PA'I NANG GI KLU GTOR RGYUN DU MDZAD CING PHAN YON CHE BAS, 'PHAGS PA @002B RIN PO CHE DANG RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED BZANG PO DPAL SOGS GONG MA RNAMS KYI YIG CHA NAS, RJE SHAR KHANG PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I YI GE LAS PHYUNG STE RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING PA'I RGYUN KHYER DU ZA HOR GYI BANDES BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS PHAN 'JAM DBYANGS SO,, ,,)
